paragraphes: with expertise in cutting-edge technologies such as
web solutions that are both innovative and robust

My name is Izaspanah Mohammad and I am passionate about programming. While my current expertise is focused on web development, I am highly interested in machine learning, a field in which I aspire to work in the future.

I am currently a computer science student specializing in programming and have already gained two years of hands-on experience in web development. This experience has allowed me to strengthen my technical skills, improve my creativity, and develop a methodical approach to problem-solving.
At only 18 years old, I am a motivated, fast, and efficient person in my work. I am always ready to take on new challenges, learn, and improve to give my best in every project I take part in.

list.descripton: SpriteSort is a website that automatically organizes your sprites by category into 2x2, 4x4, or 8x8 grids. You can also export your images as a JSON file for your video games.
list.idee: SpriteSort helps you speed up your game development or visual effects (VFX) creation. It organizes all your images into the right folders for easier access.

paragraphes.h3: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
paragraphes.p: Contact me via social media or send me an email.

footer.text: Designed with Figma and coded with VSCode
